content:
"(define fp-scale (make-parameter
                  ;; 20
                  ;;
                  ;; my monitor is 27 inch, 16:9, 2K 2560x1440
                  ;;
                  ;; pixel / mm
                  (/ (sqrt (+ (expt 2560 2) (expt 1440 2)))
                     ;; mm in diagnal
                     (* 27 25.4))))
"
